acp.manager

Class RankManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • acp.manager.RankManager

  • public class RankManager
extends java.lang.Object
    RankManager is the component that contains the ranking algorithm for learning of user behavior that produces a ranking model for ranking of suggestions and handles the store component that does the storing and retrieval of past user behavior.
    Author:
    Ng Chin Hui

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RankManager()
      Default Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RankManager

        public RankManager()
        Default Constructor. Initialize the variables and retrieve past user behavior.

    • Method Detail

      • testing_mode

        public void testing_mode()
        To enable testing mode for Unit testing. It will use different file for storing and retrieving of user behavior.

      • addNewEntry

        public void addNewEntry(java.lang.String sourceDoc)
        Register the new source document into algorithm. It will check if there are existing data and initialize with past user behavior data. Then after it is inserted into the correct position.
        Parameters:
        sourceDoc - the name of the source document

      • changeRanks

        public void changeRanks(java.lang.String sourceDoc)
        Promote the rank of the source document being viewed by the user. Used by sensor module.
        Parameters:
        sourceDoc - the name of the source document

      • learnUserBehaviour

        public void learnUserBehaviour(int lastUsedParagraph,
                      int lastUsedSentence,
                      java.lang.String sourceDoc)
        Increases the score of the most recently pasted suggestion of a particular source document. Updates the score of all source documents according to the turn of last usage(pasting) Also, promote the rank of the source document if it is in high priority list and keep track of the position of the suggestion in the source document.
        Parameters:
        lastUsedParagraph - the position of the paragraph in the source document
        lastUsedSentence - the position of the sentence in the paragraph
        sourceDoc - the name of the source document

      • removeRankData

        public void removeRankData(java.lang.String sourceDoc)
        Removal of the source document entry from the algorithm after the source document is closed.
        Parameters:
        sourceDoc - the name of the source document

      • removeAllRankData

        public void removeAllRankData()
        Remove of all entries from the algorithm.

      • storeUserBehavior

        public void storeUserBehavior()
        Store the data collected from the user behavior by the algorithm.

      • getRankingModel

        public java.util.ArrayList<RankEntry> getRankingModel()
        Method is used when require user behavior for sorting of suggestions. The method produces a ranking model for the sorting algorithm to use.
        Returns:
        a ranking model based on user behavior for sorting of suggestions

      • setDestinationDocument

        public void setDestinationDocument(int destinationDoc)
        Keep tracks of the active destination document. If the destination document is new, it will be registered.
        Parameters:
        destinationDoc - the ID of the destination document

      • removeDestinationDocument

        public void removeDestinationDocument(int destinationDoc)
        Removes the destination document entry from the algorithm as well as removes it's high and low list from the highlist-List and lowlist-List. Stores the data removed into reference list(i.e. 1st list in highlist-List and lowlist-List).
        Parameters:
        destinationDoc - the ID of the destination document

      • getLowlistList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<RankEntry>> getLowlistList()
        Get the list of high list.
        Returns:
        the list of high list

      • getHighlistList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<RankEntry>> getHighlistList()
        Get the list of low list.
        Returns:
        the list of low list

      • getDestinationDocumentList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getDestinationDocumentList()
        Get the list of destination documents
        Returns:
        the list of destination documents

      • showDebugUI

        public void showDebugUI()
        To enable the debugUI

      • closeDebugUI

        public void closeDebugUI()
        To disable debugUI

      • resetData

        public void resetData()
        For UI Testing purpose. To reset the data for new set of test scenario.
